6d0bffe17eadedd60d4599427248b0db4a7c5502.commitMessage:
HADOOP-14556. S3A to support Delegation Tokens.

Contributed by Steve Loughran and Daryn Sharp.
6d0bffe17eadedd60d4599427248b0db4a7c5502.diff:
@@ -0,0 +1,13 @@
+  public static Statement allowS3GuardClientOperations(String tableArn) {
+    return statement(true,
+        tableArn,
+        DDB_BATCH_GET_ITEM,
+        DDB_BATCH_WRITE_ITEM,
+        DDB_DELETE_ITEM,
+        DDB_DESCRIBE_TABLE,
+        DDB_GET_ITEM,
+        DDB_PUT_ITEM,
+        DDB_QUERY,
+        DDB_UPDATE_ITEM
+    );
+  }
\ No newline at end of file
